people_also_ask.heading: They Last For 3-4 Weeks As much as we'd want them to last forever, unfortunately, nail extensions only last for about 3 to 4 weeks. After a few weeks, there will be a gap between the acrylic extension and your cuticle, since your nail has grown. To fix this you'll either have to get them refilled or removed completely.01-Oct-2019
people_also_ask.title: 5 Things You Need To Know Before You Get Nail Extensions

people_also_ask.heading: It's said that extensions can harm your actual nail bed and make it brittle. However, if it's done by an experienced professional with safe and tested ingredients, then you don't have to worry about damage.01-Oct-2019
people_also_ask.title: 5 Things You Need To Know Before You Get Nail Extensions

people_also_ask.heading: Final Verdict. You should pick gel extensions if you want a natural look. They are more comfortable than acrylics and they can be removed easily without causing any damage to your nail bed. If you are looking for a cheaper alternative, pick an acrylic nail extension.29-Jun-2021
people_also_ask.title: Acrylic or gel: Which nail extension should be your pick?
